name: Those who do not believe in magic will never find it
name_original: Those who do not believe in magic will never find it
description:
This is my first Bitsy game, which I had the chance to explore and learn the editor. 

The player is a moving head - an archaeological artefact. It is trying to reach the heaven by going through the temple of Göbeklitepe. It collects idols on its way and they have some messages for the head.
